title: The persistence and resilience of misinformation in the face of fact checking - Vera.ai
snippet: A project by vera.ai, facilitated by Fabio Giglietto and Massimo Terenzi (University of Urbino Carlo Bo) and Richard Rogers (University of Amsterdam) at the Digital Media Initiative (DMI) Winter School at the University of Amsterdam. The study is based on a dataset of 38,099 Facebook stories shared between 2017 and 2022, identified as problematic by Meta's third-party fact-checkers.
description: This vera.ai post discusses a study facilitated by Fabio Giglietto and others on the persistence of misinformation on Facebook, using data from 2017-2022. It aligns with his expertise in disinformation and social media research.
